--------------------
Text: Parkway Field:  It was home to the Louisville Colonels of the American Association from 1923 into the mid-1950s, the Louisville Buckeyes of the Negro American League in 1949, and then of the University of Louisville team for several decades until they abandoned it in 1998 and moved to Cardinal Stadium.
Triplets:<Parkway Field
2: U of L Head Coach Gene Baker's

--------------------
Text: Parkway Field:  Prior to its demolition, Parkway Field had become a home run haven for U of L Head Coach Gene Baker's "Over the Wall Gang."
